response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would serve you exceptionally well. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between its intrinsic value and the opportunity cost for both parties. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you, given its alignment with your perceived valuation of $800,000. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
